com.xceptance.xlt.nocoding.scriptItem.action.response

Class Validator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xceptance.xlt.nocoding.scriptItem.action.response.AbstractResponseItem
      • com.xceptance.xlt.nocoding.scriptItem.action.response.Validator

  • public class Validator
extends AbstractResponseItem
    Uses an AbstractExtractor and AbstractValidationMethod to validate the result of the extraction.
    Author:
    ckeiner

      • Validator

        public Validator(java.lang.String validationName,
                 AbstractExtractor extractor,
                 AbstractValidationMethod method)
        Creates an instance of Validator that sets the validationName, extractor and method.
        Parameters:
        validationName - The name of the validation
        extractor - The extractor to use
        method - The method for validating

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public void execute(Context<?> context)
        Executes the validator. First, it executes the extractor. Then, if method is null, it sets it to ExistsValidator. Finally, it sets AbstractValidationMethod.setExpressionToValidate(java.util.List) with AbstractExtractor.getResult() and executes the method.
        Specified by:
        execute in class AbstractResponseItem
        Parameters:
        context - The Context with the last WebResponse and DataStorage
